Title: Study Zhang Haidi, offer everything for the people
Designer: Zhao Min (赵敏)Zhang Zhenhua (张振华)Fei Changfu (费长富)
Publisher: Liaoning meishu chubanshe (辽宁美称出版社)
Notes: Although lacking Chinese characters, the quote in the left-hand corner, "Shengmingzhishuchangqing" (生命之树常青) is from Johann Wolfgang von Goethe's Faust, "Grün [ist] des Lebens goldner Baum" (Forever green is the tree of life).
